comment: Food World Restaurants: Really decent food and at affordable prices, What a lovely restaurant, highly recommended.Thank you so much for the wonderful meal on Saturday night celebrating my birthday with my family and friends.
name: Alifuzzaman Alif

comment: We are so fortunate to have this place just a few minutes drive away from home. Food is stunning, both the tapas and downstairs restaurant. Cocktails wow, wine great and lovely selection of beers. Love this place and will continue to visit.
name: Mohsin Maruf

comment: I have to say, I enjoyed every single bite of the meal in (RN). I had a 3 course meal, with a couple of beers. Considering the quality, the price is reasonable. Ideal for those who want a romantic night out. There was also plenty of room for bigger groups
name: Sajib Yeamin

comment: Excellent food. Menu is extensive and seasonal to a particularly high standard. Definitely fine dining. It can be expensive but worth it and they do different deals on different nights so itâ€™s worth checking them out before you book. Highly recommended
name: Bakhtiar Mazrur

comment: This place is great! Atmosphere is chill and cool but the staff is also really friendly
name: Md. Tanvir Ahmed
